text: Apple introduces a proper Reminders API for developers

text: Apple launches a new AirPods app for iPhone, similar to Watch app
full-pick-text: Apple launches a new AirPods app for iPhone, similar to Watch app
notes: • Instead of an app, Apple made a section in Settings at the next WWDC.

text: Apple Music Classical ships
full-pick-text: Apple Music Classical ships
notes: • Was originally written "Apple Music Classic", but Myke pointed out that it isn't called "classic music".

text: Apple Notes will borrow some features from the modern generation of note-taking apps
full-pick-text: Apple Notes will borrow some features from the modern generation of note-taking apps, like wiki-style links, a quick switcher, or nested pages.
notes: • "...like wiki-style links, a quick switcher, or nested pages."

text: Apple Podcast app launches on Android
full-pick-text: Apple Podcast app launches on Android

text: Apple redesigns the App Store app for Mac to include iOS, macOS, and iPadOS apps together
full-pick-text: Apple redesigns the App Store app for Mac to include iOS, macOS, and iPadOS apps together

text: Apple releases a Safari API to deal with cookie consent forms
full-pick-text: Apple releases a Safari API to deal with cookie consent forms

text: Apple replaces at least one bundled macOS app with a Marzipan version
full-pick-text: Apple replaces at least one bundled macOS app with a Marzipan version
notes:
• It's called Catalyst, not Marzipan, which is pushed back on a little. Podcasts is cited as fulfilling this (is it replacing a Mac app? Stephen gets away with this a bit) and they say that Messages might now be a Catalyst app, but in fact it isn't.
  • The permissive grading may be due to the other hosts not wanting to get too picky when it comes to grading later picks.

text: Apple stops using the iTunes Store app, and moves store content into dedicated apps
full-pick-text: Apple stops using the iTunes Store app, and moves store content into dedicated apps

text: Apple TV app will receive a refreshed design
full-pick-text: Apple TV app will receive a refreshed design

text: Apple updates the Listen Now page of the Music app
full-pick-text: Apple updates the Listen Now page of the Music app

text: Apple Video and Apple Music have dedicated apps for Mac and iOS
full-pick-text: Apple Video and Apple Music have dedicated apps for Mac and iOS
notes:
• "Music and Video removed from iTunes on the Mac"
  • iTunes was eventually split up in 2019.

text: Apple will release a new programming app for iPad
full-pick-text: Apple will release a new programming app for iPad
notes:
• Federico asks to be quoted as "very very positive" that he will win on the strength of this Ricky Pick.
  • Not Swift Playgrounds, that is not new. As it turns out, they added this functionality to Swift Playgrounds.
  • This was deemed not a reuse of a previous pick since it is even riskier and more specific.

text: Apple will release at least 1 new pro app for iPad that we haven't previously seen on iPad
full-pick-text: Apple will release at least 1 new pro app for iPad that we haven't previously seen on iPad
notes:
• "(The app can be universal.)"
  • After years of waiting, Final Cut Pro and Logic Pro come to iPad in 2023.

text: At least one iOS system app is redesigned to bring its controls to the bottom of the screen
full-pick-text: At least one iOS system app is redesigned to bring its controls to the bottom of the screen
notes: • Initially, the other two rejected Stephen's argument that the lock screen counted for this. However, later on while grading another controversial pick, Steve Troughton-Smith came to Stephen's aid live and helped bolster the case that the lock screen is in fact an app.

text: Improved support for ZIP archives in the Files app and framework
full-pick-text: Improved support for ZIP archives in the Files app and framework

text: iTunes rewrite or replacement for Mac OS
full-pick-text: iTunes rewrite or replacement for Mac OS
notes: • iTunes was eventually split up in 2019.

text: iWork updates for iOS 12
full-pick-text: iWork updates for iOS 12
notes: • The big iWork update eventually came in 2019.

text: Mail.app will get modern features like snoozing
full-pick-text: Mail.app will get modern features like snoozing
notes:
• Threads can be muted, which isn't what he was talking about, really.
  • As these are "ungraded picks" being, uh, graded, Stephen is given a half point because why not.
  • Apple finally added a few features to Mail in 2022 including snoozing.

text: New features for FaceTime
full-pick-text: New features for FaceTime

text: New features for Tapback in Messages
full-pick-text: New features for Tapback in Messages
notes:
• Ungraded: more options than just the 5 built in, maybe even arbitrary emoji, better notification controls
  • It wasn't mentioned in the keynote, but yes, Tapback finally works properly for SMS.

text: Podcasts will gain audio effects for enhanced sound and trim silence
full-pick-text: Podcasts will gain audio effects for enhanced sound and trim silence
notes: • Originally was Federico's Risky Pick.

text: Redesign of the Home app... again
full-pick-text: Redesign of the Home app... again
notes: • A pick from last year gets (legally) reused.

text: Reminders gets a major update
full-pick-text: Reminders gets a major update
notes:
• "(how do we decide major? — on stage at WWDC or we decide past that)"
  • Ungraded: "some features that Federico would like to see", the actual features that Federico talked about were not recorded in the document, but were: a new, more flexible design, easier and faster to add dates and notes, tags, saved searches, better Files integration

text: Reminders will get a major redesign modeled after iOS 11 and Files
full-pick-text: Reminders will get a major redesign modeled after iOS 11 and Files
notes:
• "With new family sharing features and integration with the HomePod."
  • The redesign of Reminders did come eventually in 2019, with many more new features in 2021.

text: Workflow 2 will appear as a system feature or app

notes:
• "Heavy on Siri integration, framework for pro apps to talk to each other"
  • Ungraded: probably a migration tool from version 1, the App Store version might be kept around for a while
  • Some contention during grading about pro apps talking to each other leads to clarification that the entire pick must be true, but this one is deemed close enough.

text: You can delete Messages in the Messages app, like in WhatsApp
full-pick-text: You can delete Messages in the Messages app, like in WhatsApp
notes: • That is, the ability to revoke a sent message so that the recipient can no longer read it.
